resources.string: Hello, and again, welcome to the Aperture Science Enrichment Center. We are currently experiencing technical difficulties due to circumstances of potentially apocalyptic significance beyond our control. However, thanks to Emergency Testing Protocols, testing can continue. These pre-recorded messages will provide instructional and motivational support, so that science can still be done, even in the event of environmental, social, economic, or structural collapse. . . For the first exam please stand with your legs spread. . . . stand still. . . The portal will open and emergency testing will begin in three. Two. One.

Hello, This is the First Test of the Sway Tests. In this test I will need you to spread you legs the shoulder width, and strapped to your waist. . . . . Now We can start the test in five. . . . four. . . . three. . . . two. . . . one

Hello, this is the second of the Balance Tests. In this test I will need you keep your legs closed, so that they are touching each other, keep your eyes open . . . . . Now We can start the test in five. . . . four. . . . three. . . . two. . . . one

Hello, this is the third of the Balance Tests. In this test I will need you keep your legs closed, so that they are touching each other, keep your eyes closed , make sure they are closed, . . . . Now We can start the test in five. . . . four. . . . three. . . . two. . . . one
OM, YOU DO NOT KNOW HOW TO PLAY VIDEO GAMES
The Sway Test will consist of three different tests. Swipe left to view the instructions for each test, or if you already know how these tests work, press "Skip" to skip the instructions.
Instructions: You need to have eyes closed and\n legs opened
